Trade/Device Name(s): BioPlex 2200 HSV-1 & HSV-2 IgG Calibrator Set
BioPlex 2200 HSV-1 & HSV-2 IgG Control Set
BioPlex HSV-1 & HSV-2 IgG on the BioPlex 200 Multi-Analyte Detection System
Analyte(s): IgG antibodies to herpes simplex virus type 1 (HSV-1)
IgG antibodies to herpes simplex virus type 2 (HSV-2)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BioPlex 2200 HSV-1 & HSV-2 IgG Kit, Calibrator Set, and Control Set for qualitative detection and differentiation of HSV-1 and HSV-2 IgG antibodies using multiplex flow immunoassay
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in qualitative detection and differentiation of IgG antibodies to HSV-1 and HSV-2 in human serum and EDTA or heparinized plasma for sexually active individuals and expectant mothers as a presumptive diagnostic aid; not cleared for blood/plasma donor screening or for point-of-care, pediatric, neonatal, or immunocompromised populations.
